synopsis.text: Short, special episode featuring the endearing character Prushka, packaged with the initial Blu-ray/DVD set of Made in Abyss: Retsujitsu no Ougonkyou, offers a delightful glimpse into Prushka's everyday life with her father, Bondrewd. This bonus episode, titled "Made in Abyss: Together with Papa," presents an alternate reality where the Ido Front, located on the fifth layer, functions as a typical research facility. This heartwarming and humorous narrative was released as an extra on the first Blu-ray/DVD of "Made in Abyss: The Golden City of the Scorching Sun."
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
